dc_title_s: Bed Capacity for Major Tourist Hotels on the Eastern Coast of Kenya, 2003
dc_description_s: This point shapefile depicts the capacity, or number of beds, for major tourist hotels on the eastern coast of Kenya. These data were caluclated by the International Livestock Research Institute based on data sources from the United National Environmental Programme and the Republic of Kenya.This data was used in Map 6.4 and Map 6.5 in Nature's Benefits in Kenya: An Atlas of Ecosystems and Human Well-Being.
